name: Hot Dog Drop
description:
Hot Dog Drop

Try to get the Hot Dog as far down as possible.
Avoid enemies or hit them with your downwards dash.
Try not to lose control of your sausage, bread and mustard or you will be combo'd to death by enemies who are for some reason not happy with a passing by Hot Dog

Created for LOWREZJAM 2020 with the restriction of a max 64x64 resolution.

Controls
  • A,D, Left Arrow, Right Arrow - Move Left/right
  • S, Down Arrow, Space - Dash Downward
Tools
  • Unity
  • Asesprite
  • sfxr
